mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.transfer_id AS "transfer.id", a.sku_id AS "skuInfo.id", a.trans_qty AS "transQty", a.from_inv_op_id AS "fromInvOp.id", a.from_inv_op_time AS "fromInvOpTime", a.to_inv_op_id AS "toInvOp.id", a.to_inv_op_time AS "toInvOpTime", a.out_qty AS "outQty", a.in_qty AS "inQty", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate", a.status AS "delFalg"
LEFT JOIN biz_sku_transfer bst ON bst.id = a.transfer_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_sku_transfer_detail( id, transfer_id, sku_id, trans_qty, from_inv_op_id, from_inv_op_time, to_inv_op_id, to_inv_op_time, out_qty, in_qty, create_time, create_id, u_version, update_id, update_time, status ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{transfer.id}, #{skuInfo.id}, #{transQty}, #{fromInvOp.id}, #{fromInvOpTime}, #{toInvOp.id}, #{toInvOpTime}, #{outQty}, #{inQty}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{uVersion}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFalg} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_sku_transfer_detail SET transfer_id = #{transfer.id}, sku_id = #{skuInfo.id}, trans_qty = #{transQty}, from_inv_op_id = #{fromInvOp.id}, from_inv_op_time = #{fromInvOpTime}, to_inv_op_id = #{toInvOp.id}, to_inv_op_time = #{toInvOpTime}, out_qty = #{outQty}, in_qty = #{inQty}, create_time = #{createDate}, u_version = #{uVersion}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
